not_logged: You are not logged in! Please login to get access.
duplicate_field: Duplicate field, Please use another value!
invalid_token: Invalid token. Please log in again!
expired_token: Your token has expired! Please log in again.
token_exp_or_inv: Token is invalid or has expired
user_changed_password: User recently changed password! Please log in again.
password_check: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one digit, one special character, and be at least 8 characters long.
user_permission: You do not have user permission to perform this action.
phone_check: Phone number must contain only numbers, have a length of 10 characters, and start with 07 or be an empty string.
user_not_exist: The user belonging to this token is no longer exists.
auth_create_admin: You are not authorized to create an admin account
last_superadmin: You can not delete your Account,There has to be at least one superAdmin in the system.
admin_permission: Access denied. You must be an admin to access this route.
superadmin_permission: You do not have superAdmin permission to perform this action.
